title: The Ruckus Until Now

intro.whatIsParSaveables: A disc golf league where friends compete in tournaments and seasons, tracking stats, drama, and everything in between. Heavy bags, curses, and pocket beers define this world.
intro.tone: Hyzer and Annie should briefly explain what ParSaveables is since this is the foundation episode

highlights: Beer bag controversy: Stolen beers from the communal beer bag (later classified under the 'pocket beer' rule)
Beer transactions controversy in the doubles round - the round that doesn't count for points but counts for much more
The ironic situation: Bird won 3 rounds but Intern Line Cook won the tournament due to the scoring format
Biggest highlight: Cobra's ace in round 5
funFacts: Everyone brought their A-game... and their beer collections
The tournament that got everyone SO excited, it sparked the creation of a full season format
minneapolis2024.significance: This single tournament was so epic, it birthed the entire 2025 ParSaveables season

highlights: The winner complained about not getting any prize for winning
Others claim he 'apparently' got the highest bed in the Portlandia Airbnb - which some say is prize enough, but other factions insist that's an absurdity
The prize debate became legendary and divisive
Sadly, NO aces in the entire season (a historic drought)
funFacts: The first full season of ParSaveables disc golf
An entire season without a single ace - unprecedented!
The bed debate split the community into factions
season2025.significance: The inaugural season that established ParSaveables as a real thing

highlights: Tournament marred by controversies after controversies, making for an intense and dramatic ending
Beer trading controversy that could set a bad precedent for the future
Trophy logistics crisis: Do we even HAVE a winner if they haven't received the trophy yet?
THE BIGGEST CONTROVERSY the sport has ever seen - but one that shall not be talked about (tease it but don't reveal what it is)
funFacts: The tournament everyone will remember for decades
What happens in Portlandia... actually makes it to the podcast
The forbidden topic that sparked a thousand arguments
Trophy still MIA - winner in limbo
portlandia2025.significance: The controversial season finale that left more questions than answers

highlights: Two new entrants joining: Food Zaddy and Scarlet Speedster
Will the trophy finally be delivered?
Can anyone break the ace drought?
lookAhead2026.tone: Excited, hopeful, setting up storylines for the future

customContext.timeline: Minneapolis 2024 (the spark) → Season 2025 (the first full season) → Portlandia 2025 (the controversial finale) → 2026 (new beginnings)
customContext.overallNarrative: Episode 1 covers the COMPLETE journey: How one chaotic tournament (Minneapolis 2024) ignited a movement, leading to the first full ParSaveables season (2025), culminating in the drama-filled Portlandia finale, and setting the stage for an exciting 2026 with new players entering the fray.
